title: What Super Bowl LIII taught us about the Patriots dynasty
itunes:title: What Super Bowl LIII taught us about the Patriots dynasty
description:
The "Good Morning Football" crew starts up the show with their biggest takeaways from the Patriots' Super Bowl LIII victory over the Rams (:36).  The gang then discuss the fallout from New England's sixth championship win, including who the true unsung hero of the Pats dynasty is (5:50), and whether this was Bill Belichick's most impressive performance yet (10:00), Lastly, the GMFB team plays a little "Believe it or Not" and debate who they believe is the best football player of all time (23:56). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
